abstract: Egyptian police officer is convicted of type of manslaughter for killing poet and activist Shaimaa el-Sabbagh in January, and is sentenced to 15 years in prison; killing shocked and captivated public, due to her evident innocence of any crime.
lead_paragraph: The killing of the activist, Shaimaa el-Sabbagh, in January shocked and captivated Egyptians, because of her evident innocence of any crime.

headline.main: Egyptian Police Officer Convicted in Killing of Activist
headline.print_headline: Egyptian Police Officer Is Convicted in Killing of Activist

snippet: The killing of the activist, Shaimaa el-Sabbagh, in January shocked and captivated Egyptians, because of her evident innocence of any crime.
